text:
@WhiteHouse YES, @realDonaldTrump raised the WHITE FLAG of SURRENDER to the COVID-19 Pandemic. 

He freely admits he doesn't really CARE HOW MANY MORE Americans LIVES will be LOST . . . 

ALL he cares about is GETTING RE-ELECTED

Hundreds of Thousands of Americans WILL DIE because of that https://t.co/MDtndkQwQb
